summary: A fancy green, regal garment. Perfect for the more noble Dragonborns among us.
descriptionHtml:
=== Regal Garment ===
License: Free to use, give credit please

== Description ==
A fancy green, regal garment. Perfect for the more noble Dragonborns among us.

A simple retexture, that I decided to release. Looks pretty nice in my opinion. Please enjoy it. If you wish to use this in a mod, please just give credit, and I would appreciate if you let me know.

== Installation ==
To install, unzip RegalGarment.zip into your Data folder, or pack into Mod Organizer.
Enable in load order, and either craft at forge with two leather pieces, one leather strip, and hanging moss (for colour).

== Changelog ==
1.0.0
Release
author: oliver1706
